alert.note: Alert for Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued August 22 at 6:37AM MDT until August 23 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heat index values up to 108 this afternoon and up to 104 tomorrow afternoon. * WHERE...Todd County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Rosebud Reservation. * WHEN...Until 10 PM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses to occur.
info.instruction: To stay cool, go to an air-conditioned public building or stay indoors, close window shades and curtains, and use air conditioners or electric fans to cool rooms. Check on vulnerable neighbors, relatives, and friends to ensure they are safe.
